original_text: Developer Guide iOS SDK. Native MoEngage SDKs for iOS. Android SDK. Web SDK. Personalize SDK. Ecommerce Platforms. React Native SDK. Flutter SDK. Cordova SDK. Unity SDK. Capacitor SDK. Ionic SDK. TV and OTT Integrations. Components for SDK. API. Partner Integrations. Release Notes.
revised_text: MoEngage provides a comprehensive set of SDKs for iOS, Android, and Web platforms. SDKs for cross-platform frameworks such as React Native, Flutter, Cordova, Unity, Capacitor, and Ionic are also supported. The platform enables TV and OTT integration, robust API capabilities for user and event tracking, and seamless partner integrations to complement marketing strategies. Refer to release notes for the latest updates.

original_text: User Guide Campaigns and Channels Getting Started Introduction Delivery or orchestration types help marketers set up multiple ways to send messages...
revised_text:
Delivery Types in MoEngage Channels

MoEngage allows marketers to orchestrate message delivery through multiple types, depending on the use caseâ€”ranging from one-time blasts to event-triggered campaigns.

## Delivery Types and Descriptions

| Delivery Type | Description | Supported Channels |
|---------------|-------------|---------------------|
| **One-time** | Send messages once, immediately or at a scheduled time. Supports "Best time to send". | Push, Email, SMS & RCS, Cards, WhatsApp, Facebook Audience, Google Ads, Connectors |
| **Periodic** | Sends recurring messages at a defined frequency. | Push, Email, SMS & RCS, Cards, WhatsApp, Facebook Audience, Google Ads, Connectors |
| **Event Triggered** | Triggers messages based on user actions (e.g. viewed product, cart abandonment). | Push, Email, SMS & RCS, In-App, On-site |
| **Location Triggered** | Triggers based on user entry, exit, or time spent in a Geo Fence. | Push (Android & iOS) |
| **Device Triggered** | Triggers based on local activity on the device. Also supports offline message delivery. | Push (Android & iOS) |
| **Business Event Triggered** | Triggers based on defined business events (e.g., order confirmation, shipment update). | Push, Email, SMS & RCS |

## Notes

- **Inbound Channels** like **In-App** and **On-Site** support real-time and event-triggered campaigns.
- Delivery orchestration allows for intelligent engagement with users based on context and behavior.
